mapper.update: update spec_issue set issue_status='1' where id = #{object_id}
mapper.select: select cc.*, cu1.name as fname, cu1.head_portrait, cu2.name AS tname,cu1.address, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct cv.variety_name) as variety_name from common_comment cc left join common_user cu1 ON cc.from_uid = cu1.id LEFT JOIN common_user cu2 ON cu2.id = cc.to_uid left join common_user_care_varieties_r cr on cu1.id=cr.user_id left join common_medicine_variety cv on cr.variety_code=cv.variety_code where cc.object_type = #{object_type} and cc.object_id = #{object_id} GROUP BY cc.id order by cc.reply_time desc
select count(1) as count from common_comment where object_type = #{object_type} and object_id = #{object_id}
mapper.delete: delete from common_comment where id = #{id} or comment_id = #{id}
